analysis.description:
KZEToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x8de67d55c58540807601dbf1259537bc2dffc84d.sol#365-376) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/5/0x8de67d55c58540807601dbf1259537bc2dffc84d.sol#371-373)
